::: callout-important
## Important Announcements for Week 1

-   Read the posted notes *after* the associated class. I think of the lecture as an introduction and motivation for the material. The notes contain more material and more detail than the lecture, so please read them carefully after class.
-   Complete the exercises *after* reviewing the notes and examples (and after the associated class). The exercises often build on the examples in the notes.
-   Begin the [research project](research-project.html) immediately. I created four optional assignments for the first four weeks to help orient you. Begin by reading the three articles cited in the assignment "Descriptive Research in Your Field."
:::
